Name: Wawa United
About the game: Wawa United is a cooperative platformer where players need to make their way through together while trying to grab the most gems for themselves! Control your frog, explore the world and build the cutest lair of all! Your lobby is entirely customizable with items you can pick up or purchase as you progress in the world! To complete levels, you will need to work together, but you should always keep an eye on the precious Gems scattered on your way. Don't get too greedy though, any mistake might make your whole team lose resources! Levels are available for either 2 (currently) or 4 players (in the future), through either random matchmaking or inviting your Steam friends.
